fields.name: Develop Login Page
fields.description: Create a login page with username and password fields.

fields.name: Create UI Mockups for New Features
fields.description: Design mockups for upcoming features based on project requirements.

fields.name: Test User Authentication
fields.description: Write test cases to verify user authentication functionality.

fields.name: Create API Endpoints
fields.description: Develop RESTful API endpoints for CRUD operations.

fields.name: Design Homepage
fields.description: Design the layout and elements of the homepage.

fields.name: Develop the backend of the application
fields.description: Create the backend logic and APIs for the application.

fields.name: Implement user authentication
fields.description: Integrate user authentication functionality into the backend.

fields.name: Implement user roles and permissions
fields.description: Define and implement user roles and permissions management.
